entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 10:41 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
